墂字的基本解释

墂
biāo
古同“标”，特指用土立的标志。

墂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biāo］
［《集韻》卑遥切，平宵，幫。］
同“標1”。
特指堆土而成的标志。

墂字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　墂； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页237第14
【集韻】?遙切，音杓。封土爲識。當作標。

墂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
墂字的起名意思

暂无。

biāo
In ancient times, the "mark" specifically refers to the mark made with earthenware.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biāo］
["Jiyun" cut away from a low level, at night, help. ]
Same as "Standard 1".
Specifically refers to a sign made of piles of soil.

[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　墂; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 237 14
[Ji Yun]? Remote cut, sound scoop. Closing the soil for knowledge. As a standard.
